job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description: Wrapmate is seeking a Junior Software Engineer to assist in the creation ampamp maintenance of the software that powers our daytoday business operationsltbrgtltbrgtAt Wrapmate we begin with the end in mind Were committed to building a collaborative environment that nurtures growth and rewards excellence We support flexible working hours and ensure you may perform your role in a mix of working at the office or from home at whatever ratio suits you best We want you to be effective and the choices you make meaningfulltbrgtltbrgtWe now seek an enthusiastic Junior Software Engineer to join our growing team and help pave the way for an exciting future in the wrapping industry We are looking for someone who thrives in a learning ampamp growth environment is unafraid to push themselves a little out of their own comfort zone and ultimately seeks to grow their skillset as a developerltbrgtltbrgtThis is a fulltime salaried position with an estimated salary range of 53000 to 70000  yr Wrapmate offers a benefit package including medical dental and vision plans along with a 401k life insurance and generous vacationltbrgtltbrgtJob ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtWork closely with the engineering team to implement new features and eliminate defects from Wrapmates respective code basesltligtltligtMove between front and backend systems as needed As it is a junior position we do not expect you to be an expert in all but we do expect you to be ready to learn taking it on piece by pieceltligtltligtAdopt our engineering teams best practices leveraging source control CICD building unit tests participating in code reviews and documenting your workltligtltulgtJob RequirementsltbrgtltulgtltligtYou are either a recent College University or Bootcamp graduate andor you have some demonstrable experience developing web applicationsltligtltligtYou possess a fundamental understanding of the components that underpin web application development clientserver architecture HTTP HTML CSS and JavaScriptltligtltligtYou have worked with a middle tier language that ties the components together such as Nodejs Ruby C PHP ColdFusion etc ltligtltligtYou have worked with a database technology either SQL eg MySQL MSSQL PostgreSQL etc or NoSQL Mongo Dynamo Redis etcltligtltligtYou have familiarity with task and projectmanagement tools eg JIRA Trello Basecamp Asana etcltligtltligtAny experience with JavaScript frameworks eg Angular React Vue is a plusltligtltligtAny experience with staticsite CMS technology eg Eleventy is a plusltligtltulgtAbout WrapmateltbrgtltbrgtHeadquartered in Denver Colorado Wrapmate is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity in the workplace All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression national origin protected veteran status or any other basis protected by applicable law and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disabilityltbrgtltbrgtWe do not accept unsolicited agency resumes We will not pay fees to any thirdparty agency outside recruiter or firm without a mutually agreedupon contract and will not be responsible for any agency fees associated with unsolicited resumes Unsolicited resumes will be considered our property and will be processed accordingly
